response.overview: Marika Maneglia, also known as Marika Ferrero, has been the youngest Italian porn actress. However, the conformism and violence of this sector lead her to an important decision. Once summoned her girlfriend and her dearest friends, Marika tells them she has decided to set-up her own production company to realize a movie with non professional actors, a way to achieve her artistic objectives as well as secure a reliable source of income. The idea is very well received and the 4 friends leave for a long tour across the country to find the main actors and the money necessary to produce the film.
response.title: Un Grande Progetto
